conversation.text: I recommend checking out "Total Recall" starring Arnold Schwarzenegger. The movie is set in a dystopian future where people can have their memories implanted by a company called Rekall. The protagonist, Max Cooper, is one of the first customers to undergo this procedure. However, during his procedure, something goes wrong and Max's memories are completely erased. As he struggles to come to terms with what happened to him, Max discovers that there are people out there who have been subjected to a similar kind of treatment by Rekall. As Max starts to piece together the truth about what happened to him and the people around him, Max realizes that in order to truly escape from the horrors of his past, Max must confront and overcome the demons within himself.
